trans-unit.source: Represents security information for client application services, which includes role information.
trans-unit.target: 代表安全性資訊用戶端應用程式服務，其中包含角色的資訊。

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 當您在驗證用戶端應用程式服務中的使用者<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>或<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>設定`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>此類別的執行個體的內容</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A><xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>類別</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>的新執行個體的屬性</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>屬性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>所傳回物件`static`<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: You will not typically access this class directly.
trans-unit.target: 您將不通常直接存取此類別。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您會呼叫<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>傳回`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a ClientRolePrincipal reference to call the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以轉型<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>屬性值，呼叫 ClientRolePrincipal 參考<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法明確地範例 > 一節中所示。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.IsInRole%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property is initialized with the value of the `identity` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>屬性會初始化其值為`identity`參數。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 當您在驗證用戶端應用程式服務中的使用者<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>或<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>設定`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>此類別的執行個體的內容</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A><xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>類別</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>的新執行個體的屬性</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A>屬性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>所傳回物件`static`<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal.Identity%2A> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Gets the security identity associated with the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得相關聯的安全性識別<xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When you validate a user in client application services, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> or the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> sets the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 當您在驗證用戶端應用程式服務中的使用者<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>或<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>設定`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>此類別的執行個體的內容</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the Identity property to a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化 Identity 屬性的新執行個體的<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity>類別。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientFormsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider> initializes the Identity property to the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> object returned by the `static` <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>初始化 Identity 屬性<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity>所傳回物件`static`<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity> </xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Represents the current user.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the <xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref> is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出使用者是否已由<xref href="System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal"></xref>是否在指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you will call the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> returned by the `static` <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您會呼叫<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>傳回`static`<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can cast the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A> property value to a <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> reference to call this method explicitly, as demonstrated in the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以轉型<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>屬性值設定為<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal>明確地呼叫這個方法，如範例 > 一節所示的參考。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.ClientRolePrincipal> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsInRole method will always return `false` if the user login has expired.
trans-unit.target: IsInRole 方法一律會傳回`false`如果使用者登入已過期。

trans-unit.source: This will not occur if your application calls the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method one time shortly after authentication.
trans-unit.target: 這不會呼叫您的應用程式如果<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法一次驗證後，馬上。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application must retrieve user roles at other times, you might want to add code to revalidate users whose login has expired.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式必須擷取使用者角色，在其他時候，您可以加入程式碼以重新驗證的使用者的登入已過期。

trans-unit.source: If all valid users are assigned to roles, you can determine whether the login has expired by calling the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有有效的使用者都獲派角色，您可以判斷登入是否過期藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no roles are returned, the login has expired.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有角色傳回，登入已過期。

trans-unit.source: For an example of this functionality, see the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需這項功能的範例，請參閱<xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.ClientRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: This functionality is only necessary if you have selected **Require users to log on again whenever the server cookie expires** in your application configuration.
trans-unit.target: 這項功能時，才需要您選擇**需要使用者再次登入伺服器 cookie 過期時**應用程式組態中。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The role to check.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查的角色。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user is in the specified role; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the user is not in the specified role or is not authenticated.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果使用者是在指定的角色。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果使用者不在指定的角色，或未驗證。
